name: df-ps
body: |- wceq(cps, cab(s0, w3a(wrel(cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), ccnv(cv(s0))), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(s0))))))))
comment: Define the class of all posets (partially ordered sets) with weak ordering (e.g., "less than or equal to" instead of "less than"). A poset is a relation which is transitive, reflexive, and antisymmetric. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2008.)
